content: जयंतः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the son of Indra; पौलोमीसंभवेनेव जयंतेन पुरंदरः <ls>V. 5. 14</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 78.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--3@} The moon. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--5@} A name assumed by Bhīma at the court of Virāṭa. --ती {@--1@} A flag or banner. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the daughter of Indra. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--4@} Blades of barley planted at the commencement of the Daśarā and gathered at its close. {@--5@} The rising of the asterism Rohiṇī at midnight on the eighth day of the dark half of Śrāvaṇa {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} on the birth day of Kṛṣṇa.
